title: CommitCV
description: CommitCV is a JSON based Latex resume parser, taking in a JSON file with your resume, parsing and outputting it to either PDF, .json, or .tex.
points: Developed a JSON based online resume editor using component based cards
Implemented an Express webserver endpoint to handle pdflatex conversions
Containerized the application using Docker to manage simple deployments

title: UManitoba Computer Science Discord Bot
description: The verification and moderation bot for the University of Manitoba's Computer Science discord. Used to help manage access to the server and link discord users to their university email.
points: Assisted in Development and Maintenance of the Moderation and Verification bot for the CS Discord Server
Developed Logging feature for Moderation Commands
Worked on integrating a Pocketbase database for data storage

title: Business website for Ruby's Paradise
description: Ruby's Paradise is a small business that runs both a driving range and arcade in Winnipeg Beach, MB. I was asked to help them create a website to help enhance their presence online and to have a place to direct customers to for enquiries.
points: Developed a responsive website with Next.js using Typescript
Designed website with an adaptable card style system for conveying information
Worked to ensure designs followed WCAG Colour Guidelines

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: This is my third iteration of my personal portfolio website. The last revamp being in January 2025, working to showcase the new design and technical skills that I have developed since the last revamp.
points: Developed a personal portfolio website using Next.js with Typescript, and TailwindsCSS
Designed website with an adaptable card style system for conveying information
Deployed to an Oracle Cloud VM using Ansible and Github Actions for CI/CD
